USGS Hydrological Unit Code (HUC)

Source: R/data.R
mapUS52HUC2.Rd

USGS Hydrological Unit Code (HUC)

mapUS52HUC2

Format

A SpatialPolygonsDataFrame

Source

https://water.usgs.gov/GIS/huc.html https://nrcs.app.box.com/v/huc

Examples

if (FALSE) {
 library(sp); library(rmap)
 sp::plot(mapUS52HUC2)
 head(mapUS52HUC2@data)
}
